website_summaries.verdict: Aside from a few quirks, this face butter has a lot to offer for the price, including a formula that's versatile for most skin types.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for the rich consistency that combines tea tree oil with other essential oils including frankincense, cypress, and lavender
A little goes a long way, and it has a nice scent
cons: Some customers report it arrived melted, primarily when shipped in warm weather
Feels a little greasy and doesn't absorb quickly, but works for most

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results, great price
customer_reviews.text: Much better than any other natural skin product I’ve tried in the last 2 decades and more affordable too. I feel like I found a hidden gem here. I have oily skin easily prone to breakouts. A good moisturizer that doesn’t make me break out is hard to find. Since using this face butter my skin has cleared up and I even see fine lines disappearing! Just a small amount is needed and it deeply moisturizes, absorbs into the skin well leaving no shine, and feels and smells luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Rosacea
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer has calmed my Rosacea. I also have sensitive eyes that tear with many other creams and I haven’t had any sensitivity at all with this one. I am able to wear moisturizer during the day now without looking like I’m crying and it helps my Rosacea so much I don’t have to wear as much foundation to try to cover it. I am so happy with the results I will be recommending it to everyone. Thank you for a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: An Incredible Product
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my dry winter skin and this surpassed my expectations. Not only is it an extremely effective moisturizer, but I noticed my skin is clearer and more evenly toned. Now I'm hooked. I use it twice a day and I'll never use another product on my face. The smell is incredible too, very relaxing with lavender and frankincense. I brought it to work and everyone who tried it ordered some as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S.

customer_reviews.title: The essential oils are user friendly to sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on my face as well as my grand son's face. It has cleared up blemishes, acne and dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Guylee Washington

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is more like an oil than a cream. Think Badger products. I have only used it a couple of times thus far, but it feels good and doesn't leave an oily residue. Smells divine too. I had trouble getting the tin opened as the oil melted in transit, spilling out (just a little) making the tin lid vacuum seal to the bottom. Once I'd chilled it and cleaned the excess off it was much better to open, but I'd like to see maybe new packaging, with a glass jar and screw top lid? Or maybe even a lid that screws on and off?
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Mama

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would not satisfy my needs but for the price I decided to try it out. This is a really good night time moisturizer. It hydrates my skin while not causing pimples or irritating my rosacea. It does feel greasy when first applied but absorbs after 15 minutes or so. I wouldnt advise day time use due to the greasy factor.
customer_reviews.author: jess h

customer_reviews.title: Plastic-free, & it works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a facial moisturizer without the plastic packaging. I tried using kitchen oils--almond, olive, coconut, but my skin got flaky. As soon as I started using this product, the dry patches disappeared; my skin has some resilience again. This "face butter" is just that, and makes the hair around my temples & forehead a bit oily, though it does not rub off on pillowcases or sheets. It does not make me break out. The smell is mild--herby and a bit astringent, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly13

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this face butter for 9 months, morning and and night. I love the way my face feels, and at 61 my skin is clean and fresh looking. However each of my two orders arrived partly melted, causing a mess and loss of some product. A screw top would help! Also, I notice a white grainy quality which was worse on my first order. If not for these issues, it'd be perfect. As it is, it's very good and I'll keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: It melts
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product this afternoon so I haven't had a chance to try it. My review has more to do with the actual container it comes in. It is a metal tin which is hard to open. I struggled with it and finally it popped open. I was expecting it to be in solid form but it was melted into a liquid. It spilled. This was very disappointing. I wish the container were different to accommodate warm weather.
customer_reviews.author: TofuT

customer_reviews.title: Does not survive in heat while it is in your mailbox
customer_reviews.text: Was left in my mailbox while I wasn’t home went out to get my mail and couldn’t figure why the box was covered in and oil substance... open the box that it came in and with the heat is liquefied it and I lost all the contents of the can it had a seal around the can but it didn’t seal it once it got hot ... so if this happens to you I would suggest putting it in the fridge before opening the can... this way maybe you can save some of it
customer_reviews.author: sean w.

customer_reviews.title: New skincare obsession.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's compact which makes it perfect for tossing in purse and traveling. It's solid consistency means you only have to use a small amount to cover face, neck, and decolletage . It has a shea butter base (Shea butter is zero on the comedogenic scale) which makes it hypo allergenic. I use only natural products on my skin, and make a lot of my skincare. I have extremely sensitive skin, and am allergic to most of the ingredients in traditional and natural skincare. It's nice to find a natural face butter/lotion that uses shea instead of coconut oil. Also it's soothing to put on skin that is already irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur

customer_reviews.title: Gritty, oily and non-absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Waste of $12. Besides the great smell, this is gritty, oily and non-absorbent. It literally sat on my face for an entire day until I washed it off before bed so my pillow did not get greasy. Vaseline would have absorbed better. Will either give away or throw away. Not sure what all the reviewers claimed or maybe their skin is non-human but I won't be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: TheLadyA

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, this made me breakout.
customer_reviews.text: This made my face break out. I rubbed it on my temples and forehead and woke up with a horrible breakout I didn’t go to bed with. It may just be that my skin is too sensitive, so perhaps it’s more effective on other skin types. I liked the smell of lavender initially; however, a short time later, it turned into a sort of fatty smell (sorry, that’s probably an ineffective descriptor of the smell, but I can’t think of another way to describe it).
customer_reviews.author: Bridget D.

customer_reviews.title: Although the product is great and i really love it
customer_reviews.text: Although the product is great and i really love it, i am fairly certain the shea butter is just too rich for my skin, I got a few bumps after use but It is really powerful and very potent they absolutely do not skimp on essential oils. If you have no issues with Shea butter this product is truly awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Dalusio

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Holy Grail Product. Its done nothing but wonders to my skin! I don't even wear foundation anymore! My skin is so moisturized and radiant. My acne scars are starting to fade and when I do wear makeup it makes a beautiful primer. I use this as a night/day cream on face and neck (don't forget the neck).The Lavener scent is soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, but it leaked! Half gone
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on my skin, but the product liquefied and leaked a lot into the wrapper it was in. I feel cheated especially how much I paid for it. Update: feels great when first applied but later my skin feels clogged, suffocating and heavy like it has a mask of dirt on it. If this was a light carrier oil base ( coconut oil base) instead of a petroleum-based product, I feel it would absorb better.
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Like the natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This is thick and kinda greasy but white and creamy with consistency of whipped butter. Infused in it is a variety of a fabulous combo of essential oils. Perfect for bedtime but can be used during the day as well if used sparingly. Besides my face and neck, I've also massaged this on my hands/nails and used in my hair. I really like this stuff, especially considering it's cruelty-free and also very natural without any chemical type ingredients. Happy with purchases (bought 2 of the face butter) and plan to try some of the others soon like the Heal All and Eucalyptus.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: The scent is amazing....
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a decent product but 2 things: (1) getting it open for the first time is very difficult and (2) even being tightly closed, the product was a melty mess upon arrival. Looking at other reviews, the manufacturer is aware and hasn't corrected the problem. I don't know about you but $11.50 for 2oz of product means that I want ALL that I paid for. On a better note, the scent is fanwonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: taminphilly

customer_reviews.title: Blown Away
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a million facial oils and moisturizers. I tried this for the first time yesterday and at first was unimpressed with how oily I looked however it absorbed fairly quickly and smelled amazing. When I woke up this morning my face was so soft and my complexion was absolutely radiant. I applied it again before work and my face felt moisturized all day. I got home showered and applies it to my face and neck as well as my tattoos. Again my skin feels healthy and smooth and I can already see a difference after only one day. I will be buying this product again and again and again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Guadalupe

customer_reviews.title: Grainy and soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and really liked it. I gave my tin to a friend. I ordered another and it came melted, when it solidified it was grainy. I waited till winter to order again, but it came grainy and soft. I tried to order again but it is also grainy and soft. I will not be ordering again. This was a really good face butter the first time I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad shipping/container.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works great, a little goes a long way so it should last a while. I apply a thin layer before bed and wake up with a moisturized, soft face. Product feels gritty but smooths out when rubbed in. One star off because it arrived having soaked through the container leaving greasy packaging and the container itself is very difficult to open, almost impossible the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Neikam

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible feeling on the face for me. I would not buy this for face moisturizer. Doesn't have a good smell at all and didn't even leave my skin soft after it wore off. Not what I was expecting at all. Makes me wonder about the other reviews the only thing I found nice about the product was the cute canister holding it
customer_reviews.author: Kasse Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing but Waxy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product, but, I find that it is "waxy". This product is definitely not water soluble!! I tried it because another reviewer reported that it did not make her eyes tear. I have extremely dry and sensitive eyes, and that means that if even an incredibly tiny particle lands in my eyes, it is extremely painful and irritating. With this product, I found that if I got it near my eyes or touched my eyes after using it on my face, even after washing my hands, I was unable to clear it from my eye. So, be aware that if you have a problem with dry eyes, use extreme caution.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not the same,so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well the first one I bought was so good .So I bought a 2nd one.I am very disappointed in the scent & how liquified it is.I really liked texture & the scent of the 1st one.it was more like solid beer's wax...anyway wish you be more consistent with your product.
customer_reviews.author: teri vinther

customer_reviews.title: Much softer than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Copaibra sore muscle rub a while back and it was a very hard balm so I thought this would be the same way, but it’s a really soft and buttery face cream. I’ve used it on the raw spots near my nose and mouth without any burning or irritation. If it doesn’t exacerbate acne (I’m worried the coconut oil and olive oil might) then this will be a great addition to my routine. Smells like a mix of peppermint and lavender to me which is really pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Probably Brandon’s wife who commandeered his account

customer_reviews.title: best face treatment ever
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical. all i could see was oil , oil , oil. and I thought this was going to make my face feel greasy. Amazingly it does not. It absorbs well into the skin. Makes your face soft. You only need a little. Rub your hands together and smooth over your face. This is the best product I've tried for my face. Clears up the skin and makes it so soft. I can't say enough about this product. Try it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It works!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in great condition and I enjoy using the essential face butter occasionally. I could sense that my skin was softer, dark spots and skin tone was more balanced, and overall I consider my skin to appear more healthy. I strongly recommend this product! The product is quite oily however, so try not to use so much at one time. Tip: Try twisting the cap off so the lid can come off easier.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Fowler

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST FACIAL MOISTURIZER I'VE EVER HAD EVER
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST FACIAL MOISTURIZER I'VE EVER HAD EVER. I struggle with dry, sensitive skin and adult acne which means I often have scabs on my face and uneven color. I have only been using this face butter for 5 days and now I don't even need to wear foundation. There are no chemicals and no strange ingredients so it's perfect for sensitive skin. It's given me a lot of confidence back.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Tripard

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The smell is non offensive/The tin is adorable/The moisturizer is amazing/Truly cruelty free product as it is not sold in China; any skincare or makeup that is sold in China must be tested on animals, by law
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Way too greasy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my previous essential oil moisturizer is no longer sold on Amazon and too expensive. I like that the ingredients are safe for my skin, but it's oily as ****. If I put 2 foundations over this, my face is still a bit shiny. Really need to use loose powder. I hope to find something else next time, less greasy.
customer_reviews.author: 1lostyankee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I live in a dry climate and winters can be brutal. I was very pleasantly surprised! A little goes a long way and it’s a bit oily ( Shea butter) but it absorbs quickly. I usually wake up with dry feeling skin but not today! It feels a tiny bit gritty at first so make sure to rub and warm it on your finger tips. I’ll buy more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna O

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dry hands!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry hands and use raw shea butter and a brand of balm called rum rub, my preference is zum rub because of scent options. I gave this company a shot and wasn't disappointed. It just takes a dab, very nice consistency, leaves a non-oilly sheen...hands felt softer. The tea tree hits hard the first 5 minutes , don't apply in close spaces lol.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Not good for the face
customer_reviews.text: The little tin is pretty but not easy to get into! It arrived melted at the top so it was messy once opened. The smell is just ok, I definitely have better scented lavender products than this. It’s very oily/greasy so I won’t be using it on my face. Will use as a hand cream and don’t plan to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ❤️amazing 💗 best thing I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is crazy awesome! I love it it's got every oil that is great for skin! I will never be without this stuff! I just cannot believe what a diff it makes, I have people asking what I use, and saying your skin looks great now, what are you using! Glycolic acid and this stuff! Perfect combo for taking 10 years off! Unbelievable the change!
customer_reviews.author: demetria s.

customer_reviews.title: Just because it's not expensive, doesn't mean that it is an inferior product
customer_reviews.text: As an Esthetician this is the most amazingly effective product and affordable. Beauty doesn't have to be expensive!!!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Ann Nock

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product, Terrible Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Glad to see they improved the package after my last purchase. I like this moisturizer but this last container I opened is impossible to open. Frustrates me enough I don't plan on purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It goes on a bit greasy but it soaks into my skin in about 20 minutes and leaves my face smooth. The smell is wonderful too. My sister did try it and it tingled on her skin but after the 2nd use it didn't. I am on my 2nd tin of this and will continue using it as long as they keep making it.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: So I usually buy this kind of thing on etsy because I find the essential oil quality is lacking unless it's a small batch, handmade,etc but this stuff is AWESOME. I have used it on dry skin on face, a burn on my hand and I put some behind my ears as a perfume because the smell is so delicious!! Great price - can't go wrong!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tosh0913

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to renew your face while you sleep or anytime of the day!
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a beautiful tin. I put this on after my shower and the scent hits me. This would be perfect just before bed. That lavender is so wonderful, it would help with sleep. I massaged it into my face and neck. It feels fantastic. I had been looking for something for my face that would moisturize and not have me break out. I think I just found what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: A Natural Product that actually is ALL Natural!
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely picky about the products I use on my sensitive skin so I looked at the ingredients first. Other products irritate my skin or even burn in winter when I’m more dry. I was pleasantly surprised that there weren’t any additives, emulsifiers, or unnatural ingredients. A small amount absorbs well and is light enough to wear under makeup while a little more before bed makes me wake up feeling as soft and pampered as if I had a facial the day before. I’m truly impressed by the quality and eager to try other products in this line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is by far THE BEST moisturizer I have used on my face! It smells like you just left the spa, like essential oils, it gives the skin a glow and tightens skin too, really a superior product a little goes a long way , it is a little hard to open but beside that I really recommend it!! I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: happymama13

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: The stuff I swear is magic. It keeps my skin soft, decreases the lines and keeps my skin clear. A little goes a very long way. Note I also have terrible psoriasis on my left foot and this has for the most part kept it at bay and got rid of it. This is my third purchase and I will keep on buying it
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a spoiled little brat using this...My skin has always been dry and no expensive moisturizer has left my skin feeling this hydrated and plumped. I love that the ingredients are natural and simple. I don’t normally break out from things but I think this is great that it has added tea tree to fight off infections. Love it so far.. 😍😍 buying one for my mom and sisters. Oh and idk If it was the package change.. but I had no problem with melting or hard to open container.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Don't order if you have trouble opening small containers
customer_reviews.text: I love the lotion but unfortunately, my arthritis is making it almost impossible to open the can.
customer_reviews.author: ,Mary collette

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, container needs some help.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, the scent also helps with my sinuses but is not too strong. The only problem was when I first got it, I couldn't get the container open because some of the product had seeped into the edges. My Husband had to pry it open, but love the product!
customer_reviews.author: mamabeargreerlovesaz

customer_reviews.title: Eczema cleared up
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Vaseline on my face previously, (I have terrible eczema and in the winter my face gets really dry and patchy). Lotions never even touch it. This is soooooooo much better and also feel like it’s really brightened my skin in use a couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: C. XOXO

customer_reviews.title: I love this product is the best cream of used on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product is the best cream of used on my face in many years and it's all natural smells fantastic and really works I'm buying salve for the third or fourth time after a long time they change the packaging who made the product little better which is hard to believe however they Shrunk the size a little bit but it is still worth the money it is wonderful on the face and hands or anywhere you need to use it I wish they made a larger sized as well though it was delivered quickly and packaged well note to continue to order this product as gifts and for myself
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne  Andreoli

customer_reviews.title: All natural product !
customer_reviews.text: Literally obsessed with this face moisturizer!! It all natural, everything comes from Mother Earth. It’s mosturizing and keeps my face hydrated underneath my make up. This literally lasted me 7 months, a little goes a long way. I love the new packaging super cute !!! Highly recommend to anyone looking for an all natural product with no other chemicals added to it. I can’t find anything in the stores like this
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Different package - has weird like rubber smell now
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if they changed something but even though I love the product it does have this weird rubber/chemical type smell with the new packaging (like the old smell is there but you also smell this other smell on the side - maybe literally the container material or something)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: nice smell
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to receiving this product - but I have to say the grainy-ness is very off putting. It makes it very difficult to use and initially I thought it was a facial scrub - I will use it up because eventually it absorbs but it's no fun to use
customer_reviews.author: Toni5000

customer_reviews.title: You May not get The New Packing until they’ve sold out of the existing
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase Of the face better. I do love the product however I am unhappy about the packaging. I was hoping to get my new tune with the new look, but I will set the older version. No big deal but they can keeps getting stuck and I have to pry it open I almost cut myself trying to open it it’s sucks but I still love it
customer_reviews.author: TheeChardonnay

customer_reviews.title: It melts - and makes a mess if you’re not careful
customer_reviews.text: The scent is too strong for my face - I use it on my hands though. I love the case for carrying in my purse - but careful not to get it warm. It melts. In fact, it arrived melted and liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Edgelander

customer_reviews.title: Broke out REALLY badly
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty oily skin and I'm prone to acne. I decided to give this a try, because it's different than any other product I've used and I wanted to try something different. After two uses I broke out. I kept using it, in hopes my skin would get used to it, but my acne only got worse. Once I stopped using it and switched back to my regular moisturizer, the breakout went away. It smells really good and has nice packaging, but I wouldn't recommend it to someone with oily or acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Oli Grenke

customer_reviews.title: Decent face butter, didn't work for my needs
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice enough face butter - it smells good, goes on easily, and you don't need to use a lot (a little goes a long way). But, it didn't solve (or even help) with either of the problems I bought it for, my dark spots and acne.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Manheim

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with this stuff - A must have if you want soft skin and great smell
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stuff I’ve ever bought for my face ... The smell is amazing, my face after the first use felt so soft the next day ... I just had surgery and it’s amazing for scars also... six of my girlfriends bought this product after they noticed the difference in my face and after they tried it they fell in love with the smell ... I wish they made a bigger tin/ bottle... A little goes a long way .. but I still wish they had a larger one... I definitely will be buying this again
customer_reviews.author: MsElise

customer_reviews.title: All natural...and really works!!!You won't be disappointed in this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's all natural,(or I wouldn't have purchased)Am 63and for years I used olive oil and primrose...then went to coconut oil. This far surpasses them hands down!It only takes a little to totally moisturize your skin,and lasts ALL day!!m
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: try this!!
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this for a while and finally decided to try it. I’m super glad I did, it has an amazing scent and goes on super well. Easy to use, easy to store, hydrating and one of my favorite products right now.
customer_reviews.author: PSN

customer_reviews.title: Try it. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! Clears skin. Mends cu6ts fast. Scent is heavely. The little beads will emulsify in your hand as warmed. Keep it in cool environment because it will melt in the heat. Loyal customer. Second purchase. Even got one for sister in law.
customer_reviews.author: BB Oakian

customer_reviews.title: Works okay, but made me break out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this meaning to get the hand wax, but bought the face was instead. I do have dry spots, specifically in the winter, but this stuff made me break out like crazy. I have sensitive skin, so it probably wasn't the products fault. Does seem to make my hands a bit softer though.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: great for face
customer_reviews.text: I really like this butter. It has a wonderful scent and keeps my face hydrated. It doesn't cause breakouts and I'm one that has to worry about adult acne. I love the scent of the oils and glad I found a cream that helps my skin. I only use this at night but you could probably use in AM too.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: No improvement in skin tone
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and this looks really greasy when I put it on. It absorbs well and I can wear it under makeup. It also smells great. I have been using it for several months and there is no improvement to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: mu

customer_reviews.title: Soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: This leave my face feeling so soft after the shower the only problem is opening the jar, it is a little tough but I like the product none the less. I also haven’t broken out using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Household

customer_reviews.title: dreamy scent to fall asleep to and no more oily skin
customer_reviews.text: The scent is a dreamy way to fall asleep to get moisture overnight and it is affordable on a monthly subscribe and save. It is now one of my favorite rituals for my health, as the results of my oily skin is no longer oily and great for when my skin is dry too.
customer_reviews.author: Dio Genes

customer_reviews.title: very smooth....
customer_reviews.text: The product feel great on your face. I use it to smooth the way for my vibrator I use to strenthen the muscles on my face. The vibrator just glides smoothly and effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: McDee

customer_reviews.title: I re-ordered!!! I love the results I'm seeing and have only used 1/2 the tin!
customer_reviews.text: I realized I was using too much of the product at 1st, thus, my previous report that it didn't absorb. After using it sparingly, I LOVE it! So much so, that I just ordered and received a 3 pack! Also, I had my Sister try it for a few days, and, she has ordered a 3 pack for herself! I've been dealing with deep smile lines for several years now. After using properly, the lines are becoming much less noticeable! I will be 65 years old, soon! I'm very pleased with my results!
customer_reviews.author: PolynesianLady

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It moisturizes well and smells so good! I haven’t noticed a huge change in the tone of my skin like others did but I do really like it. I may try another scent.
customer_reviews.author: jcourt

customer_reviews.title: Can clog larger pores but smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love this Product but have notice it clogs my pores pretty quickly. I spread out when using days wise and that seems to help. Love the smell, packaging, and very giftable!! Might buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smells good!!
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizing.. but it might be breaking me out. Not sure but it smells good!!... update: definitely causing many small breakouts on my face
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars ..BUT
customer_reviews.text: So this product would be 5 stars, and I will be making it a staple in my regime BUT the packaging is horrible. It's so hard to open the jar...I wish it was easier. Going to be a nightmare if you have long nails and I don't even have my nails done yet!! 🥴🥺 GOOD PRODUCT THOUGH. NO BREAKOUTS AND SUPERRRR MOISTURIZNG!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: So thankful for this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this moisturizer! I have olive skin that is very sensitive and can get hyperpigmentation easily. This helps keep that away for me. It’s the only moisturizer I use besides rose hip oil and I’ll mix it together. I have been using this for over a year and I am so pleased with how it makes my skin look and feel, I would feel lost without it. This has become my everyday skin ritual and I highly recommend it for anyone especially someone with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product many times. I’m glad they have improved the tin. Much easier to open and close
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing at healing
customer_reviews.text: I use this on cuts and scrapes. It’s amazing. They heal within days. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this twice now. It's great, especially in the cold winter months. It seems a little heavy/greasy when first applied, but when applied at night, before bed, it keeps my skin soft, and just right during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I do love this product, however the consistency of this order is very different than my first purchase. The first time I bought it was more like a moisturizing lotion. The second time it’s more like an oil with moisture beads. I am hoping the next time I order it will be the original consistency, a creamy moisturizing face cream.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: I use this product every day - just love it!  Smells awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I've actually been using this on my dry cuticles at night. I love the texture and scent of this product. The lavender in this smells better than any I use when diffusing. I just ordered my second one recently. This is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really like it and had to stop use. It was too oily for my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should not use on face
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with product broke out in small pimples on face. Even though it says natural products will NEVER USE ON FACE AGAI IN
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful and feels nice
customer_reviews.text: This goes on sooo smoothly and easily, but be careful a little goes a long way. It leaves your face a bit shiny, but I actually like that. It looks healthy. Smells great and feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Sending it back- Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: No pleasing scent to this product at all like others have reviewed- also, the product feels like a scrub more than a body butter- it’s extremely gritty- and felt greasy on my arms and legs. Disappointed. Was hoping for better-
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Woodsmoke

customer_reviews.title: Glow, Girls
customer_reviews.text: Cool package and great formula in terms of the essential oils and subtle scent. My face glows when I use it and seems to glow each time I do. It’s a little greasy. It’s hard to keep the amount in line.
customer_reviews.author: Renedied69

customer_reviews.title: Quality product but nothing spectacular
customer_reviews.text: It is just ok, nothing bad and nothing amazing. Moisturizer for my face, only takes a little so the product lasts a while. Not impressive enough to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I dont like how greasy it is and will probably only use ...
customer_reviews.text: This product comes in a small tin and does seem to moisturize. I dont like how greasy it is and will probably only use it at night on my face for this reason. Overall i think its fine but not for the face for day use. I also feel its a bit pricey for what u receive.
customer_reviews.author: boodog

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be in a better container. Spills easily.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. However “Tin” it is in is so disappointing. The lid is very difficult to get off because it creates a suction. It also melts very quickly. When I first got it from amazon I was opened it and it spilled everywhere. This needs to be in screw off top. Please change the packaging!
customer_reviews.author: G Berisford

customer_reviews.title: Face moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product. Unfortunately it was delivered during a 90 degree day and it turned into a liquid and some of it’s contents leaked out
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Mcclure

customer_reviews.title: Much younger appearance.
customer_reviews.text: At 65, I no longer believe there are miracle de-aging products. I have spent several dollars on top brand skincare lines, such as Dr. Gross, Fresh, etc. At long last I came across this face balm, and it has diminished lines, creases, and lifted saggy jowls. Plus, redness and age spots are fading. Thank you, Amazon, for this miracle! Love’
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Calarco

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: The best facial moisturizer I have ever used!! Clears up blemishes and feels and smells amazing!! For the first time in about 15 years I feel good enough in my bare skin to go out with no makeup on! I use this after every shower and before I go to bed and that with my face wash are the only products I use now!
customer_reviews.author: Cchilds

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaay too strong to put on face or really anywhere. Triggers migraine. Stinks really bad like an antique shop/flea market.
customer_reviews.author: JRenee

customer_reviews.title: The goods.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome and can be used head to toe. Highly recommend in cold, dry weather for protection and rehydration.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Kenty

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating tin container!
customer_reviews.text: I've left 2 stars only because the tin containing the product is nearly impossible to open; because of this I've accessed the 'butter' only once. Seemed very nice but I may never be certain. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: VT~VA

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say this seemed oily and my face broke out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft Shea with nice smell and great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome face butter leaves your skin so soft. Very moisturizing and smells like essential oils. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 10 stars if i could. Absolutely love this stuff. I can use it in the sunmer and its not too heavy. I can also use it in the harsh winter months. Plus it smells fantastic. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: kat170

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life
customer_reviews.text: I woke up in the morning and my face was hydrated and glowing! Makeup wore really well on top of it after it absorbed completely. My skin gets really dry in the winter and is very sensitive but this product is gentle and powerful. Smells great too. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Great as a nighttime moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to use as a night time moisturizer, and I bought this because of the tea tree and lavender. I’m not sure how much tea tree oil is actually in it but the lavender is noticeable. I love using it especially now in the dry winter air because of how moisturizing it is. A little goes a long way - I even use it on my hands!
customer_reviews.author: Carly G.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This salve is creamy and smells amazing. You only need a little bit. The frankincense has been clearing up my redness and I put it in n iuou ghtly because it has lavendar in it to bvb help relax. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: Can is very hard to open
customer_reviews.text: The can was a big struggle to open. Now the lid will not go back on all the way. Very frustrating. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Hartman

customer_reviews.title: It’s oily
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed because I really wanted to love this product. I like the concept of essential oils in a moisturizer for the face. Unfortunately it’s too oily for me. The smell is fine and I’m sure it’s quality but it’s too darn oily, the oil residue does not ever absorb. So as much as I wish it was for me, it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Riley

customer_reviews.title: New look
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product when it had the "old" packaging you could smell the lavender, frankinsense and tea tree and now it has a new look but it feels like a heavy cream with no smell of the herbs mentioned
customer_reviews.author: yo

customer_reviews.title: Great for dermatitis!
customer_reviews.text: This may be too greasy for 'regular' dry skin, but if you suffer from dermatitis that causes severe dry skin, this is fantastic. I've tried lotion after lotion to combat my dry patches, but this does the job. Just be careful when opening it... mine came on a hot day and when I opened it right away, half of it leaked down the drain because the heat turned it into a liquid. It's more of a solid at room temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Crissman

customer_reviews.title: Do not like the smell
customer_reviews.text: The oil is nice, seems to moisturize my skin nicely but I can't get passed the smell. Sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jakes

product_meta.title: SVASTHYA BODY & MIND Essential Oil Face Butter - Naturally Nurtures Skin & Restores Complexion, Has Shea Butter, Coconut, Argan & Grapeseed Oil, Made In The USA, 2 oz
feature_bullets: SAFE, EFFECTIVE, and 100% NATURAL! Restore your skin's complexion Naturally, Reduce Acne, Prevent Wrinkles, and Awaken your Spirit with our Rich and Creamy Face Butter. Made with the perfect blend of ingredients to keep skin Healthy and Rejuvenated. The concentration of natural vitamins and fatty acids in Shea Butter makes it incredibly nourishing and moisturizing for skin. Perfect to remedy dry skin and to help protect the skin's natural oils.

Grape seed oil is non-comedogenic and rich in Vitamin E which helps tighten and moisturize the skin. It reduces inflammation, redness, and accelerates the healing of acne and superficial scars. Coconut Oil naturally repairs skin, delays the aging process, and gives it a healthy glow. It helps prevent premature aging and wrinkling of the skin due to its good antioxidant properties.

Argan Oil nurtures your skin delicately without clogging your pores. It regulates the production of sebum which helps prevent breakouts and its Vitamin A & E content help fade scars and reduce wrinkles to smooth out the skin’s texture.

Discover the NATURAL HEALING and therapeutic properties of PURE Essential Oils. Lavender Essential Oil restores skin complexion and reduces acne. Frankincense Essential Oil is a powerful astringent, meaning it helps protect skin cells, while reducing the appearance of dark spots. Tea Tree Essential Oil is considered one of the most effective natural remedies for acne.

ABSOLUTELY NO CHEMICALS, FILLER OR BINDERS, so the cream is extremely concentrated, and a little goes a long way! Each ingredient has a BENEFICIAL EFFECT on the skin. No petroleum, harmful preservatives, parabens, sulfates, artificial colors, artificial fragrances, SLS or harsh chemicals of any kind making it safe for babies, kids and pregnant women. Cruelty free and Made in the USA. *Product may separate if exposed to extreme heat*
